hints.content:
On a clock there are two hands. The $\redD{\text{hour hand}}$ is the shorter hand.  The $\blueE{\text{minute hand}}$ is the longer hand.

![A clock shows the short hour hand points to 5. The long minute hand points to 12.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/45a764740b107b33cf6707c08fe70c7abdbda8c9)

$\redD{6}{:}{\blueE{15}}$ is $\blueE{15}$ ticks from $\redD{6}{:}{00}.$

![A clock shows the short hour hand is just past 6. The long minute hand points to 15.  Outside the edge of the clock 12 is labeled 0, 1 is labeled 5, 2 is labeled 10, and so on with 11 labeled 55.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/cdc31dc17393c64b2624635559bfc33be50ed6b9)

$\redD{6}{:}{\blueE{00}}$ is $\blueE{0}$ ticks from $\redD{6}{:}{00}.$

![A clock shows the short hour hand points to 6. The long minute hand points to 12.  Outside the edge of the clock 12 is labeled 0, 1 is labeled 5, 2 is labeled 10, and so on with 11 labeled 55.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/485e25d0bca840baa550412962f47b43bfcbde80)

$\redD{6}{:}{\blueE{30}}$ is $\blueE{30}$ ticks from $\redD{6}{:}{00}.$

![A clock shows the short hour hand is halfway between 6 and 7. The long minute hand points to 6.  Outside the edge of the clock 12 is labeled 0, 1 is labeled 5, 2 is labeled 10, and so on with 11 labeled 55.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/2030c0124a5b030b34e54dc9f48a816118ee1006)

Notice the hour hand is past $6{:}00$ but not quite to $7{:}00$.

Here is the completed table:

Time | Clock
- | - | -
$6{:}15$ | ![A clock shows the short hour hand is just past 6. The long minute hand points to 3.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/04706b00c24081e311a67356732edef4a019278d)
$6{:}00$ | ![A clock shows the short hour hand points to 6. The long minute hand points to 12.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/3f3bbffe3df3eee168d13a8d1ced9fed79267b32)
$6{:}30$ | ![A clock shows the short hour hand is halfway between 6 and 7. The long minute hand points to 6.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/641a67082fd058116f6698cb3301ba1b8322928c)

question.content:
**Match the clocks to the correct time.**

[[â˜ƒ matcher 1]]

right: ![A clock shows the short hour hand points to 6. The long minute hand points to 12.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/04706b00c24081e311a67356732edef4a019278d)
![A clock shows the short hour hand is just past 6. The long minute hand points to 3.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/3f3bbffe3df3eee168d13a8d1ced9fed79267b32)
![A clock shows the short hour hand is halfway between 6 and 7. The long minute hand points to 6.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/641a67082fd058116f6698cb3301ba1b8322928c)
